MapperVersion: The Lesser Snow Goose (Chen caerulescens caerulescens) colony on Howe Island, near Prudhoe Bay, Alaska, is the only established nesting colony of this species in the United States. A study was initiated to follow the dynamics of this small population in 1980 when it became clear that oil development would proceed near the nesting colony and in nearby brood-rearing areas.
